section.p: Upgrade from JavaEE to JakartaEE 10. Requires Java 11+ and an application server that supports JakartaEE 10 such as Payara 6.
Changes to support Python 3. Now works on Python 2.7 and Python 3. Note: support for Python 2.6 is now dropped.
Provide compatibility with Payara and make into a service.

ul.li: Property files renamed as not moved to config anymore.

section.p: Implement the Authenticator interface 4.5.0 with the getDescription() call, and support multiple containers.

ul.li: Change the properties.example file to include mechanism by default.
Change the setup.properties.example file to use the property dbProperties rather than authn_dbProperties.

section.p: Allow multiple authenticators to be deployed together.
This release supports encrypted passwords. It is backwards compatible except that any existing passwords with a leading '$' must be changed as these will be treated as encrypted passwords.
